fields.name: welcome_email
fields.description: A welcome email when the user signs up (not a registration email)
fields.subject: Hi {{ user }}
fields.content:
Welcome to Princeton Scientific

This email confirms your user login.

fields.name: contact_us_cc
fields.description: A CC_myself email, for users sending a message _to themselves_ as they send a message to the website.
fields.subject: Message Sent to Princeton Scientific: {{ email.created }}
fields.content:
This is a copy of your message, sent through the Princeton Scientific website:

{{ email.message }}

fields.name: web_contact
fields.description: The contact from a web message to the administrators.
fields.subject: "{{ email.subject }}" from {{ email.get_email }}: Web contact

fields.name: basket_checkout
fields.description: The user has checked-out a basket, complete with details for an order.
fields.subject: Princeton Scientific Order (confirmation)
fields.content:
Hi {{ user }}

Thank you for visiting the Princeton Scientific Corporation online UHV shop! 
We have received your requested order item(s) and will send our formal pricing quotation shortly through this email. 

Should you have any questions or concerns, please contact us by phone at (609) 924-3011 or via email at sales@princetonscientific.com

---

This email was sent to you directly from the Princeton Scientific website services on domains .com, .shop, .store, and .site 

You're receiving this automated email because you interacted with our services. We will not use or share this information for any purpose other than processing this transaction.

Thanks Again!
 - Your Princeton Scientific Robot

---

P.S. I've really enjoyed being the voice in your head 
 - robot.

fields.name: admin_alert_basket_checkout
fields.description: Message to the system admin for when a checkout occurs
fields.subject: Cart checkout occured: {{ user }}

fields.name: stock_notification
fields.description: User request for a stock notification when a product is updated. The model is a StockNotification.
fields.subject: stock notification request {{ model.product }}

fields.name: product_contact
fields.description: A web content for a Product question - a ProductContact model. This is the same as a ContactMessage with an additional `product`.
fields.subject: Question about  {{ model.product }} from {{ email.get_email }}: Web contact

fields.name: processing_cart_alert
fields.description: A message sent to the client when the 'processing' phase is set upon a cart.
fields.subject: We're Processing your order!
fields.content:
Hi {{ user }}

This is a quick message to tell you we're processing your recent order. {{ url }}

fields.name: verify_email_change
fields.description: Announce an email change to the primary email address. The user must verify with the token.
fields.subject: Verify your email address change

fields.name: stock_change_alert
fields.subject: Product back in Stock!
fields.content: Product "{{ product }}" is back in stock.
